full_summary:
**6 Passenger Marine Craft**
============================

**Reference Number:** PW-MC-009-29015
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-23
**Closing Date:** 2023-05-02T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Request for Proposal:**
The Department of Parks Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the procurement of one (1) 6.5-6.7 meter aluminum marine craft, including trailer and engines.

**Background:**
The primary use of this marine craft will be to transport Parks Canada staff between Happy Valley/Goose Bay, Cartwright, and Rigolet, as well as back to Happy Valley/Goose Bay, for the Akami-Uapishku-Kakkasuak-Mealy Mountains National Park Reserve.

**Deliverables:**
All deliverables must be delivered to Parks Canada at 114 Hamilton River Road, Happy Valley/Goose Bay, NL, A0P 1E0 no later than March 31st, 2024.

**Business Requirements:**
- The successful bidder must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- The bidder must meet all mandatory requirements outlined in the request for proposal.
- The lowest priced compliant proposal will be recommended for award.

**Documents:**
Documents related to this procurement can be accessed at the following URLs:

- [Attachment PDF 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/24/e5c1273c35f94e63570d957572746bbe/ABES.PROD.PW__MC.B009.E29015.EBSU002.PDF)
- [Attachment PDF 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/17/e6802a4baef14ab0f34a2491171677cc/ABES.PROD.PW__MC.B009.E29015.EBSU001.PDF)
- [Attachment PDF 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/d2eceb6dcb8fc14b574c35f5546595d5/ABES.PROD.PW__MC.B009.E29015.EBSU000.PDF)
- [Attachment PDF 4](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/28/b193
